name: chrome-control
description: Control Chrome browser with MCP - navigate, click, type, screenshot, execute scripts and more
long_description: This MCP extension allows Claude to control a Chrome browser instance using Puppeteer. Features include page navigation, element interaction (clicking, typing), content extraction, screenshots, JavaScript execution, cookie management, and full browser automation capabilities. Perfect for web scraping, testing, and automated workflows.
